data_table.description: The sample attributes II file includes sample ID, lab ID comprising the sentrix processing ID and position, array, plate and well information (n=6 variables), qc status and comments (n=2 variables), disesase prevalence and incidence (n=14 variables), hybridization date, and concentrations before and post bisulfite conversion.

variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: SHARE subject ID and substudy phs accession number

variable.name: LABID
variable.description: Sample ID based on Lab work and or Sentrix_ID and Sentrix_Position

variable.name: Sample.Well
variable.description: Sample well on methylation chip Sample_Plate

variable.name: CHD.prev
variable.description: Coronary Heart Disease prior to Exam 8 (prevalent)
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: CHD.new
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: CI.prev
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: CI.new
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: ABI.prev

variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: ABI.new
variable.description: Atherothrombotic Infarction of Brain after Exam 8 (prevalent)
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: CABG.prev

variable.value: Not present at time of review

variable.name: CVD.prev
variable.description: Any of the above cardiovascular diseases prior to Exam 8 (prevalent)
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified

variable.name: CVD.new
variable.description: Any of the above cardiovascular diseases after Exam 8 (incident)
variable.value: Not present at time of review
adjudicated endpoint identified
